Detailed Description

Counters generate by each gid and accumulated on the collector process

Such object contains a static set of interger and floating point value counters. Each counter should be interpreted with respect to the CounterManager::manager that stores the information about the type of counter and the way two values may be merge.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum
Enumerator:
MAX_COUNTERS 

Maximum allowed counters per type (interger or floating point) This constant should be redefined if required
